thread.title: BRIEF-CEFC Anhui's Controlling Shareholder Has Used 441.1 Mln Shares In The Company As Collateral

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CEFC Anhui's Controlling Shareholder Has Used 441.1 Mln Shares In The Company As Collateral

organizations.name: cefc anhui international holding co ltd

text:
March 6 (Reuters) - CEFC Anhui International Holding Co Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER HAS USED 245 MILLION SHARES IN THE COMPANY OR 10.8 PERCENT OF TOTAL ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL AS COLLATERAL ON MARCH 5
* SAYS AS OF MARCH 6, CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER HAS USED 441.1 MILLION SHARES IN THE COMPANY OR 19.4 PERCENT OF TOTAL ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL AS COLLATERAL Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FqAxN5 Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
